title: Notify all agents of received request
actions: [{'field': 'notification_user', 'value': ['all_agents', '[{{ticket.account}}] {{ticket.title}}', 'A ticket (#{{ticket.id}}) by {{ticket.requester.name}} has been received. It is unassigned.\n\n{{ticket.comments_formatted}}']}]
raw_title: Notify all agents of received request

title: Notify assignee of assignment
actions: [{'field': 'notification_user', 'value': ['assignee_id', '[{{ticket.account}}] Assignment: {{ticket.title}}', 'You have been assigned to this ticket (#{{ticket.id}}).\n\n{{ticket.comments_formatted}}']}]

title: Notify group of assignment
actions: [{'field': 'notification_group', 'value': ['group_id', '[{{ticket.account}}] "{{ticket.group.name}}" assignment:  {{ticket.title}}', "This ticket (#{{ticket.id}}) has been assigned to group '{{ticket.group.name}}', of which you are a member.\n\n{{ticket.comments_formatted}}"]}]

title: Notify requester and CCs of comment update
actions: [{'field': 'notification_user', 'value': ['requester_and_ccs', '[{{ticket.account}}] Re: {{ticket.title}}', 'Your request ({{ticket.id}}) has been updated. To add additional comments, reply to this email.\n{{ticket.comments_formatted}}']}]
raw_title: Notify requester and CCs of comment update

title: Notify requester and CCs of received request
actions: [{'field': 'notification_user', 'value': ['requester_and_ccs', '[Request received]', 'Your request ({{ticket.id}}) has been received and is being reviewed by our support staff.\n\nTo add additional comments, reply to this email.']}]
raw_title: Notify requester and CCs of received request

title: Notify requester of new proactive ticket
description: A proactive ticket is a ticket created by an agent on behalf of the requester.
raw_title: Notify requester of new proactive ticket

title: Past Internal Note when ticket is created
raw_title: Past Internal Note when ticket is created

title: Auto-assign to first email responding agent
raw_title: Auto-assign to first email responding agent
